pages.title: Inicio
pages.purpose: Presenta el repositorio ExampleGithubActions, explica su propósito como ejemplo/plantilla de GitHub Actions y ofrece una descripción general de alto nivel de su contenido.

pages.title: Repository Structure
pages.purpose: Document the file system organization of the repository, explaining the .github/workflows directory convention and the location of Example.yml

pages.title: GitHub Actions Fundamentals
pages.purpose: Provide foundational knowledge about GitHub Actions as an automation platform, explaining core concepts necessary to understand the Example.yml workflow file

pages.title: Workflow Files and YAML Structure
pages.purpose: Explain what workflow YAML files are, their syntax, and the standard structure of a GitHub Actions workflow definition

pages.title: Triggers and Events
pages.purpose: Document the various events that can trigger workflows (push, pull_request, workflow_dispatch, schedule, etc.) and how to configure them

pages.title: Jobs, Steps, and Runners
pages.purpose: Explain the execution model of GitHub Actions including the hierarchy of jobs and steps, and the role of runners in executing workflows

pages.title: The Example.yml Workflow
pages.purpose: Provide detailed documentation of the Example.yml file, its current empty state, and its intended role in the repository

pages.title: Current State and File Analysis
pages.purpose: Document the current contents (or lack thereof) of Example.yml, explaining why it's empty and what this means for the repository

pages.title: Workflow Configuration Reference
pages.purpose: Provide a comprehensive reference for the workflow configuration options that could be added to Example.yml, including all standard YAML keys and their purposes

pages.title: Usage and Extension Guide
pages.purpose: Provide practical guidance for developers on how to use this repository as a starting point and extend Example.yml with actual workflow definitions

pages.title: Creating Your First Workflow
pages.purpose: Step-by-step tutorial showing how to populate Example.yml with a basic workflow definition, from defining triggers to adding jobs and steps

pages.title: Common Workflow Patterns
pages.purpose: Document common CI/CD patterns and example configurations that can be implemented using Example.yml, including testing, building, and deployment workflows
